replies.msg:
依排成日都聽到香港人想移民

不得不承認, 醫護都好多伸手黨
無論大家想繼續留低
定係唔想再留喺依個地方
都想同各位醫護介紹下點樣拎澳洲個牌

講咗醫生先:

分兩方面講.
一個係未考專科
一個係考咗專科

醫生一畢業, 一定要喺香港做咗個internship先.
唔好諗住咁快走, 外國好多地方都唔係太收interns的.
愛爾蘭好多醫學院對international medical graduates (IMG)係俾佢讀書, 但唔俾佢本土做Intern (今年武肺例外)
所以想走都好. 有咩做埋個intern先.
留名聽RN

之後就講下入去做有兩條pathways
https://www.medicalboard.gov.au/Registration/International-Medical-Graduates/Standard-Pathway.aspx


但最主要都係考試PATHWAY, 叫" Standard pathway"
即係要考AMC CAT MCQ 考試
依個考試3.5小時
其實對香港學生冇乜難度
要知道外國醫科curriculum其實冇香港教得咁深入
但唔代表唔洗溫. 起碼你要知人考乜. 同埋人地會考local 嘢. 例如法例.
有好多question banks依到就唔講啦.

如上圖所見
考完MCQ先有得考AMC clinical examination
之拎到個AMC cert就可以去medical board 到register 啦.

必需一提佢地clinical exam
其實唔會有真係有sign 嘅病人
唔會好似香港咁搵真病人俾你考. 香港好多時其實係MRCP, MRCS level

個考試16個stations
包medicine, surgery, obstetrics, gynaecology, paediatrics, psychiatry
考試仲有個重點係你點同家屬病人溝通
所以之前好準備下你啲counselling嘅英文啦

依到有個YOUTUBE CHANNEL參考下啦
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WzbMA46X_Ro&list=PLEhaEKjIlRaXm9bqYHpEwlJEvpM_fd7-6

至於你話唔想考埋clinical就過去得唔得?

如果有人請你就得.
可以邊做邊考
或者申請work place based assessment

但每年英國其實好多人考AMC
要睇你夠唔夠人爭啦.

至於專科醫生又點呢
其實澳洲好在喺香港train嘅專科醫生唔洗再考試
但就要同番各自college申請
睇下你個training係咪"partially/substantially comparable"
千祈唔好太腦定.
有時可能少少文件唔夠都搞你好耐.

以下係佢地College 嘅list
可以跟返自己個College上去再睇
https://www.amc.org.au/accreditation-and-recognition/assessment-accreditation-specialist-medical-programs-assessment-accreditation-specialist-medical-programs/specialist-medical-colleges/

假設你係A&E專科醫生
咁你就要交自己個general+specialist training qualifications
交CV
受訓個details (有足夠description, 例如平均見幾多症, 喺咩醫院見, 有大約咩Case-mix)
有啲資料可能要自己香港個College出番封信俾你證明你係受過咩訓練

有同事以前交完仲會需要飛過去一次類似見board咁
完埋依關你個specialist 資格就算有認證
之後就可以開始搵工啦
補足一句: 醫生嘅英文要求係IELTS Academic 4個7

有人覆再講埋護士.
利申: 唔係中介,唔洗問我邊個中介好.
有無dental資料

留名
好多同事話走
澳洲免專科再考Undergrad試好吸引

New legislation introduced to strengthen nurse to patient ratios.
Health Minister Jenny Mikakos announced legislation would be introduced to Parliament today to strengthen nurse and midwife-to-patient ratios.

The new ratios will create a further 500 nursing and midwifery positions, building on the additional 600 positions created by ratio changes last year.

"We know that these ratios deliver better care to patients," Ms Mikakos said.

"I want to take this opportunity to thank all of our nurses and midwives.

"They have been facing very anxious times in responding to patients coming in with coronavirus but also supporting and caring for patients, not knowing ... whether potentially they may have that virus — so we thank them for their selflessness."

Australian Nursing and Midwifery Federation state secretary Lisa Fitzpatrick said the ratio changes were a welcome relief.

"For almost 15 years we had been struggling and had found it very difficult to get any improvement in the ratios," she said.

"[The changes] needed to happen to reflect the increased complexity and the increased demand on our health system as a result of the growing population here in Victoria and changes to the health system."

如果去美國train可以考定USMLE

有時間寫RN了.
基本上澳洲寫到明承認加拿大, 美國, 英國, 愛爾蘭同香港嘅nursing
請唔好咁腦定, 而家承認唔代表將來都承認 .
首先睇咗依個圖做self-check先, 香港有degree應該都係stream A
AQF 7 qual 即係degree, AQF 6係associate degree, AQF 5即係diploma

完成self-check之後要交晒啲文件過去NMBA (Nursing and Midwifery Board Ahpra)
https://www.nursingmidwiferyboard.gov.au/Registration-and-Endorsement.aspx
佢睇咗你啲文件OK後, 部份candidates可能會被要求考個MCQ test
叫National Council Licensure Examination for Registered Nurses (NCLEX-RN)
另外仲有個OSCE (clinical exam)可能要考
而家聽成功過去啲護士都冇需要考依兩個試
但香港咁多nursing schools, NMBA係每個case獨立睇, 所以唔敢話一定唔洗考.

https://topick.hket.com/article/2208205/80後護士移民澳洲操故業%EF%BC%9A香港護士福利不會追得上?mtc=40001&srkw=%E6%BE%B3%E6%B4%B2&lcc=at

這情境讓Annabelle既新奇又感慨，因為在澳洲能真正做「護士」的工作，但在香港醫院就因人手不足，令護士需兼顧多方面，包括醫生、文員等的工作也需協助，她慨嘆在香港完全無法與病人有這類窩心的接觸。
Annabelle直言在香港的職場文化亦並不好受，見盡很多「白鴿眼」同事對清潔人員、抽血員不禮貌，更很多很惡和沒禮貌的醫生會擺著「高高在上」的姿態，發問的話只會被回應『你自己用腦想想吧』、『這種問題你也要問？』，她認為護士工作不被尊重：
曾聽過有病人投訴某護士不禮貌，但不記得名，然後病房經理就叫所有同事一字排開，讓投訴人「認人」，過程就好像在警署認犯人，完全不尊重護士。

這情境讓Annabelle既新奇又感慨，因為在澳洲能真正做「護士」的工作，但在香港醫院就因人手不足，令護士需兼顧多方面，包括醫生、文員等的工作也需協助，她慨嘆在香港完全無法與病人有這類窩心的接觸。
Annabelle直言在香港的職場文化亦並不好受，見盡很多「白鴿眼」同事對清潔人員、抽血員不禮貌，更很多很惡和沒禮貌的醫生會擺著「高高在上」的姿態，發問的話只會被回應『你自己用腦想想吧』、『這種問題你也要問？』，她認為護士工作不被尊重：
曾聽過有病人投訴某護士不禮貌，但不記得名，然後病房經理就叫所有同事一字排開，讓投訴人「認人」，過程就好像在警署認犯人，完全不尊重護士。

有時間寫RN了.
基本上澳洲寫到明承認加拿大, 美國, 英國, 愛爾蘭同香港嘅nursing
請唔好咁腦定, 而家承認唔代表將來都承認 .
首先睇咗依個圖做self-check先, 香港有degree應該都係stream A
AQF 7 qual 即係degree, AQF 6係associate degree, AQF 5即係diploma

完成self-check之後要交晒啲文件過去NMBA (Nursing and Midwifery Board Ahpra)
https://www.nursingmidwiferyboard.gov.au/Registration-and-Endorsement.aspx
佢睇咗你啲文件OK後, 部份candidates可能會被要求考個MCQ test
叫National Council Licensure Examination for Registered Nurses (NCLEX-RN)
另外仲有個OSCE (clinical exam)可能要考
而家聽成功過去啲護士都冇需要考依兩個試
但香港咁多nursing schools, NMBA係每個case獨立睇, 所以唔敢話一定唔洗考.

個fact sheet咁寫的

「The Extended Education Pathway in the NMBA English language skills registration standard specifies that you must be able to demonstrate five years of continuous education (as defined) taught and assessed in English in a recognised country, including a minimum of two years (registered nurses and midwives) or one year (enrolled nurses) of a nursing or midwifery program of study. The five years of continuous education may be a combination of tertiary and/or vocational and/or secondary education. If you are able to demonstrate that you meet the standard through this pathway, then you do not need to sit another English language test.」

Recognised countries: Australia, United States, United Kingdom, Canada, New Zealand, the
Republic of Ireland and South Africa.
所以要喺依啲國家讀完仲要即報master先幫到你exempt 英文試。

replies.msg:
Visa 190詳細資料

Subclass 190 – Skilled Nominated Visa

Every State or Territory Government publishes a list of occupation in which workers of different skills are required. This is the State Nominated visa that invites the nominated skilled workers to live and work in Australia permanently.

Process

Applicant must go through the following process:

Firstly, check the eligibility to apply for Subclass 190 by selecting the relevant occupation from the skilled occupation list. Secondly, get a positive skill assessment. Thirdly, calculate the points of interest in Skill Select
Submit the EOI if points of Interest are at least 65
EOI of applicants is visible to state and territory governments and in case of shortage of skills, state or territory government nominate the applicants in the Skill Select
Get the invitation to apply if nominated by the state or territory government
Apply within 60 days of invitation
Eligibility

Applicant must have:

Age less than 45 year
An occupation listed on the relevant Skilled Occupations list
Positive skill assessment from the relevant assessing authority
Scored at least 65 points on the points test
Invitation to apply for the visa
Meet health and character requirements
Competent English language

https://immi.homeaffairs.gov.au/help-support/tools/points-calculator

可以自己計下夠唔夠分
再申請Expression of interest

物理治療師註冊

首先去澳洲物理治療委員會做個self assessment
https://physiocouncil.com.au/overseas-practitioners/getting-started/
可惜香港嘅物理治療programs唔喺list of equivalent programs到
所以需要經Equivalence of qualification pathway去申請https://physiocouncil.com.au/overseas-practitioners/equivalence-of-qualification/new-program/
你需要聯絡大學交一堆文件再交俾council：
 Self-Assessment Tool
 Passport Photo Identity Page
 Degree Certificate
 Statement of Results
 Evidence to Practise
 Map to Physiotherapy Practice Thresholds
 Evidence to Meet the Assessment Criteria
睇完以上咁多樣可能都未知要交咩，詳情睇依張Fact sheet，裏面有晒Template
https://apc-11666.kxcdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Equivalence-of-Qualification-New-Program-New-Criteria-Fact-Sheet-v2-FINAL.pdf

Council之後會俾張Certificate of Substantial Equivalence俾你

然後就可以去返physiotherapy board到註冊
https://www.physiotherapyboard.gov.au/Registration/Overseas-Practitioners.aspx

最後講埋英文要求
係同護士一樣
需要IELTS有4個7
https://www.physiotherapyboard.gov.au/documents/default.aspx?record=WD15%2f16880&dbid=AP&chksum=px4gMFl360IujXiFqasp3g%3d%3d

replies.msg:
當然有啲round高分啲
但係即係70分未必唔得

留意返唔係所有master 都得
要"澳洲教育機構授予的研究碩士學位或博士學位，該學位須為科學、科技、工程、數學或個別資訊和通訊科技領域，至少有 2 年學年"
即係MPhil
要讀最少兩年, 咁就10分

反之如果你做三年嘢就有5分同埋你有穩定收入
做夠5年仲有10分添.
到時你28歲, 正正係最高分嘅時候.

如果真係爭少少
語言又唔錯
可以考慮埋社區語言認證測試Credentialed Community Language (CCL)
搵咗啲資料大家參考下
"考試時間總共20分鐘~
考試內容:以簡單日常的對話為考題~大約是2篇約300字的對話~
考題生活 相對比較簡單
考試題目裡
你將會聽到一個人說中文
一個人說英文
當你聽完中文句子時~你需要把它翻譯成英文句子~並且說出來
當你聽完英文句子時~你需要把它翻譯成中文句子~並且因為句子都是較日常的句子而且考生是一句一句的翻譯~
不需要做任何背誦或是繁雜筆記的"
可以揀考廣東話
不過考試費幾貴. 800澳元. 所以準備好啲先考吧.
同埋澳洲先有得考.

但你移民前如果都想去睇睇, 咪考埋個試睇下有冇得加5分.
搵到個YOUTUBE 片介紹:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nMOVdv0sV9g
